73  inline void subscribe(std::string topic_name_pose,std::string topic_name_odom)
74  {
75  this->sub_pose_=this->nh_.subscribe(topic_name_pose,10,&InputPoseOdom::setPose,this);
76  this->sub_odom_=this->nh_.subscribe(topic_name_odom,10,&InputPoseOdom::set,this);
77  }
78 
79  inline void set(nav_msgs::Odometry msg)
80  {
81  this->setAngVel(msg);this->setLinVel(msg);
82  this->time_=msg.header.stamp;
83  }
84 
85  inline void setPose(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped msg)
86  {tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose,this->pose_);}
87 
88  inline void setLinVel(nav_msgs::Odometry msg)
89  {
90  tf::vector3MsgToTF(msg.twist.twist.linear,this->lin_vel_);
91  this->lin_vel_=tf::Transform(this->pose_.getRotation(),tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0))*this->lin_vel_;
92  }
93 
94  inline void setAngVel(nav_msgs::Odometry msg)
95  {tf::vector3MsgToTF(msg.twist.twist.angular,this->ang_vel_);}
96 };
